rect.style: display: inline; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1; pointer-events: none;

text.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 13.3333px; font-family: Arial; text-align: start; writing-mode: lr-tb; direction: ltr; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(49, 49, 49); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 3; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 9.84311px; font-family: Arial; display: inline; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 9.84311px; font-family: Arial; display: inline; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 9.84311px; font-family: Arial; text-align: center; text-anchor: middle; display: inline; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 9.84311px; font-family: Arial; text-align: center; text-anchor: middle; display: inline; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

path.style: display: inline; fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0.942; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 15.0657px; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre; display: inline; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 1.036;

tspan.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 15.1px; font-family: Arial; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 1.036; stroke-opacity: 1; word-spacing: 0px;

circle.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 2.826; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 0; stroke-opacity: 1;

path.style: display: inline; fill: rgb(47, 47, 47); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0.471; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-opacity: 1; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;

text.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 15.0657px; font-family: Arial; text-align: center; text-anchor: middle; display: inline; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 16px; font-family: Arial; text-align: center; text-anchor: middle; display: inline; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 16px; font-family: Arial; text-align: center; text-anchor: middle; display: inline; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 16px; font-family: Arial; text-align: center; text-anchor: middle; display: inline; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 16px; font-family: Arial; text-align: center; text-anchor: middle; display: inline; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
